verses.verse: <S%G2532><s%> <S%G5209>You<s%> were made alive when <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G5607>were<s%> <S%G3498>dead<s%> in transgressions <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G266>sins,<s%>

<S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> you <S%G4218>once<s%> <S%G4043>walked<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> the <S%G165>course<s%> of <S%G5127>this<s%> <S%G2889>world,<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> the <S%G758>prince<s%> of the <S%G1849>power<s%> of the <S%G109>air,<s%> the <S%G4151>spirit<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G1754>works<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G5207>children<s%> of <S%G543>disobedience;<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G5607>being<s%> <S%G4145>rich<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1656>mercy,<s%> <S%G1223>for<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G26>love<s%> with <S%G3739>which<s%> he <S%G25>loved<s%> <S%G2248>us,<s%>

<S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G5607>when<s%> <S%G2248>we<s%> <S%G5607>were<s%> <S%G3498>dead<s%> through our <S%G3900>trespasses,<s%> made us alive together <S%G4806>with<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> (by <S%G5485>grace<s%> you have <S%G2075>been<s%> <S%G4982>saved<s%>),

<S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G165>ages<s%> to <S%G1904>come<s%> he might <S%G1731>show<s%> the <S%G5235>exceeding<s%> <S%G4149>riches<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5544>kindness<s%> <S%G1909>toward<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus;<s%>

<S%G1063>for<s%> by <S%G5485>grace<s%> you have <S%G2075>been<s%> <S%G4982>saved<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G4102>faith,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5124>that<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G5216>yourselves;<s%> it is the <S%G1435>gift<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%>
<S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G2443>works,<s%> <S%G3361>that<s%> no <S%G5100>one<s%> would <S%G2744>boast.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> we <S%G2070>are<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4161>workmanship,<s%> <S%G2936>created<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1909>for<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G2041>works,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G4282>prepared<s%> before <S%G2443>that<s%> we would <S%G4043>walk<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>them.<s%>

<S%G1352>Therefore<s%> <S%G3421>remember<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G4218>once<s%> <S%G5210>you,<s%> the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> who <S%G3588>are<s%> <S%G3004>called<s%> <S%G203>"uncircumcision<s%>" <S%G5259>by<s%> that which <S%G3588>is<s%> <S%G3004>called<s%> <S%G4061>"circumcision,<s%>" <S%G1722>(in<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> made by <S%G5499>hands<s%>);

<S%G3754>that<s%> you <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G2540>time<s%> <S%G5565>separate<s%> from <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G526>alienated<s%> from the <S%G4174>commonwealth<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3581>strangers<s%> from the <S%G1242>covenants<s%> of the <S%G1860>promise,<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G1680>hope<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> without <S%G112>God<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2889>world.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G3570>now<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5210>you<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G4218>once<s%> <S%G5607>were<s%> far <S%G3112>off<s%> are <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G1451>near<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G129>blood<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

having <S%G2673>abolished<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>the<s%> <S%G4561>flesh<s%> the <S%G2189>hostility,<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> of <S%G1785>commandments<s%> contained <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1378>ordinances,<s%> <S%G1519>that<s%> he <S%G2443>might<s%> <S%G2936>create<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> of the <S%G1417>two,<s%> <S%G4160>making<s%> <S%G1515>peace;<s%>

<S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846><s%> might <S%G604>reconcile<s%> them <S%G297>both<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4983>body<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G4716>cross,<s%> having <S%G615>killed<s%> the <S%G2189>hostility<s%> <S%G1722>thereby.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> He <S%G2064>came<s%> and <S%G2097>preached<s%> <S%G1515>peace<s%> to <S%G5213>you<s%> who <S%G3588>were<s%> far <S%G3112>off<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to those who <S%G3588>were<s%> <S%G1451>near.<s%>

<S%G3754>For<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G2192>we<s%> <S%G297>both<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> our <S%G4318>access<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> the <S%G3962>Father.<s%>

<S%G3767>So<s%> <S%G686>then<s%> you <S%G2075>are<s%> no <S%G3765>longer<s%> <S%G3581>strangers<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3941>foreigners,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> you are fellow <S%G4847>citizens<s%> with the <S%G40>saints,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of the <S%G3609>household<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%>

<S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> the <S%G3956>whole<s%> <S%G3619>building,<s%> fitted <S%G4883>together,<s%> <S%G837>grows<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> a <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G3485>temple<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord;<s%>
